name: Madam Eva
skills: Arcana +7, Deception +8, Insight +13, Intimidation +8, Perception +9, Religion +7

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Madam Eva is a 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). Madam Eva has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, protection from poison, spiritual weapon
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, protection from poison, spiritual weapon

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): create food and water, speak with dead, spirit guardians
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): create food and water, speak with dead, spirit guardians

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): divination, freedom of movement, guardians of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): divination, freedom of movement, guardians of faith

descriptions.raw: 5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, raise dead
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, raise dead

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): find the path, harm, true seeing
descriptions.hyperlinked: 6th level (1 slot): find the path, harm, true seeing

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Curse (Recharges after a Long Rest).
descriptions: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the target is blinded and deafened. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a remove curse spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Madam Eva takes 5d6 psychic damage.

actions.name: Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save DC 17), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Madam Eva is blinded until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.
